item.title: Introducing the tuftesque blogdown theme
item.description: This post will serve as a quick tutorial getting you from nothing to a customized blogdown blog using the theme built for this blog: tuftesque. It doesn‚Äôt cover the more standard details such as writing new posts as I feel those have been covered much better than I could here. The Basics Getting Blogdown If you already have a blogdown site than you can skip to the next step. If you do not, open R in a new fresh directory and run the following commands:

item.title: useR!2017 digressions
item.description: We both recently attended useR!2017 in Brussels. It was a blast to say the least.
